---
title: Execution Control
format: html
execute: 
  warning: false
  error: false
  echo: true
  output: false
---


```{r}
library(purrr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(glue)
library(quarto)
library(here)
```


```{r}
render_fun <- function(penguin){
	
	quarto::quarto_render(
		input = here("03-quarto", "parameters-example", "penguin-report.qmd"),
		execute_dir = here("03-quarto", "parameters-example"),
		execute_params = list(species = penguin),
		output_file = glue::glue("{penguin}-report.html")
	)
	
}
```


```{r}
unique(penguins$species) |>
	as.character() |> 
	purrr::walk(.f = render_fun)
```
